import React from 'react' import {connect} from 'react-redux' import classes from './viewSingleProductForSeller.module.css' const ViewSingleProductForSeller=(props)=> { return (
{props.singleproductForSeller!=null?











:null}
) } const mapStateToProps = state => { console.log(state.product.singleproductForSeller,"single product for seller") return { singleproductForSeller: state.product.singleproductForSeller } } export default connect(mapStateToProps)(ViewSingleProductForSeller)
